document_data.Yes\n|1\n|Before [[1492 DR]]\n|[[Roan Fe: "note" name="VanDate">BC stands for Barovian Calendar and is the calendar system used in the [[Domains of Dread]]. Van Richten's birth date is stated to be [[w:c:ravenloft:671 BC|671 BC]] on page 4 of ''[[w:c:ravenloft:Van Richten's Arsenal|Van Richten's Arsenal]]'' and in ''[[Van Richten's Guide to Werebeasts]]'' the author states that he was "born nearly threescore years ago," meaning that the 730's are the most rough approximation that can be given for the book's creation.
